data.title: Rational & Strategic
data.description: My mid-school history teacher once told me that there are five simple questions that can answer to everything: Where, when, who, how and why. Until now I use them as tools in my everyday life.

data.title: Problem Solver & Inventor
data.description: 10+ mid-to-large size projects have taught me that every problem has a solution.

data.title: All-rounded & Balanced
data.description: Although it's really hard to keep the balance - there are so many interesting stuff to do!
